summary: Owners of Portugal is a documentary about 100 years of economic power. The film portrays the protection of the State to the families that dominated the country's economy and its strategies for conserving power.
cast: Gonçalo Amorim|Fernando Rosas|António de Oliveira Salazar|Alfredo da Silva|Henrique Sommer|Marcello Caetano|Jorge de Mello|José de Mello|António Champallimaud|Américo Thomaz|Cupertino de Miranda|Eugénio Rosa|António de Spínola|David Rockefeller|Ernesto Geisel|Augusto Pinochet|Mário Soares|Fernando Nogueira|Ricardo Salgado|Belmiro de Azevedo|Américo de Amorim|Artur Santos Silva|Manuel Boullosa|Pina Moura|António Guterres|Jorge Coelho|Mira Amaral|Américo Amorim|Miguel Cadilhe|Mário Conde|Carlos Manuel Tavares da Silva|José Manuel Durão Barroso|José Eduardo dos Santos|José Manuel Elias da Costa|Carlos Santos Ferreira|Jorge Jardim Gonçalves|François Mitterrand|Alexandre Soares dos Santos|António Vitorino
title: Donos de Portugal
